Class TetrisBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisBoard

  • public class TetrisBoard
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean[][] board 
      Piece currentPiece 
      int[] currentPiecePosition 
      boolean isRoundDone 
      int lineScore 
      int pieceRotation 
      int tetrisScore 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TetrisBoard()
      constructor for TetrisBoard it initializes the game board to false, and adds a random piece to the board!

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void movePieceDown()
      moves a piece one row down (as long as it's a valid move)
      void movePieceLeft()
      moves piece to the left by decrementing the column by 1
      void movePieceRight()
      moves piece to the right by incrementing the column by 1
      void rotateCCW()
      rotates the piece counter-clockwise by decrementing the rotation variable, ensuring it doesnt go below 0 degrees
      void rotateCW()
      rotates the piece clockwise by increasing the rotation value (that is often passed into the pieces .isFilled() method, making sure the value of the rotation doesn't exceed 270 degrees

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public void rotateCCW()
